message.body: Hey, so I'm going to pass on yoga tonight. I'm completely exhausted but I have your present part 2! Are you still going to yoga? Could I meet you outside
What!?! Ugh! Can I help in any way!? Are you sure you can still meet? I'll be quick I promise!
I'm not sure if I'm going to go, major wedding crisis today aghhhh (my salon canceled on me for tmw, leaving me fucked before the shoot basically), but I am more than happy to meet up with you!!!

I think the problem was actually just solved!! Hillary's been calling salons arouns here to get me an early morning appt before I head up to pa, and she just got me a cheap one in bethesda. I'm just way too drained for yoga haha, but I would love to see y
Oh good! Can I get a rain check on dinner? Maybe one night next week? I really hope you don't take this the wrong way. I'm just tired and want to make su
re I have the proper foods/amount of sleep before tomorrow's run. I'm sorry!
Hahaha not a problem! Trust me, I understand the need to eat the right things before a race!!!
I'm going to head out of work now...should we just schedule sth for next week? I'm assuming you're probably still trapped at work? :-\
Are you heading straight to the yoga studio? I can run in if you are to give you your gift?
Ha I don't blame you. Yes, let's definitely meet up next week! Let me know how it goes tomorrow ;)
I'm going to skip yoga and just go home, I'm way too drained/angry for a class haha
Will do!! And same, good luck!!!! :-)
